attributes.action: For David Cameron to engage in a live televised debate about current A&E issues with Dr Rob Galloway an A&E Consultant
attributes.additional_details: We feel that it is time that real A&E staff have a chance to face the politicians. Enough of this politician to politician posturing about the Health Service and about issues they do not actually understand. It is time that senior A&E staff come face to face to directly question Mr Cameron about why the government has been systematically destroying our wonderful National Health Service.

rejection.details: This is a party political matter and not one for the government.
